text.headline: Clint Plummer
text.text: Software engineering leader with over 20 years experience developing for the web across multiple languages. Highly collaborative with an excellent understanding of development best practices throughout the entire SDLC, growing high-performing agile teams and crafting/executing on company product roadmaps. Demonstrated success in collaborating with both executives and technical/non technical stakeholders, leading to many successful deliveries

text.headline: Fractional CTO / Product Owner / Lead Engineer (Contracting)
text.text: Startup Adviser and Lead Engineer, specialising in 0-day startups. I provide strategic guidance, lead MVP development, and offer general & technical management expertise to help startups succeed from day one

text.headline: Entrepreneur in Residence (Antler)
text.text: Antler is a VC fund and accelerator program that invests at the pre-seed stage, nurturing businesses and startups through to series C

text.headline: Founder / CTO (Will I Wake)
text.text: So much of what makes you, you, is now online. What happens to it when you leave this earth? From social media & photos to crypto currency, Will I Wake is your digital caretaker in the afterlife, a digital will for an increasingly digital generation

text.headline: Engineering Manager (GOAT)
text.text: GOAT is an American online platform offering sneakers, luxury apparel and accessories through primary and resale markets, employing around 1,500 people globally it is a unicorn multiple times over valued at around 4.5B

text.headline: Solutions Architect (Travelport Locomote)
text.text: Locomote is a corporate travel management platform that makes business travel hassle-free. It's quick to implement, easy to use, and scales to fit your needs
